message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal for you at a price of $180.
That price is way too high for me. I'm only willing to pay $120.  Let me know if you're interested.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you in the middle at $155.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still only willing to pay $135. This is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $145.
I'm really trying to make this work, but I can't go any higher than $140.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'd really like to close this deal.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we might not be able to meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise at $147.50, but that's as low as I can go.
